snippet: China's economy grew slightly faster than expected in the second quarter as a burst of government stimulus paid dividends, but analysts said further support was likely to be needed to meet the government's growth target for 2014....

headline.print_headline: China Growth Picks Up as Stimulus Pays Off
headline.main: China Growth Picks Up as Stimulus Pays Off

lead_paragraph: China's economy grew slightly faster than expected in the second quarter as a burst of government stimulus paid dividends, but analysts said further support was likely to be needed to meet the government's growth target for 2014.
